::Kup::
   
  Kup: Well, lad, something happened to you. When you showed up you
 were speaking in tongues and surging with power. You were playing out the
 tough warrior from beyond gimmick. You were ready to take on Cyclonus
 and Scourge by yourself if it were to save Rodimus and The Matrix. Even
 after Rodimus came up with a one on one duel with cyclonus on a near by
 island you disobeyed and went after them to interfere.
       
---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile.  Try it now.
